Package com.cmput301f23t28.casacatalog.database

Class ItemDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.cmput301f23t28.casacatalog.database.ItemDatabase
public class ItemDatabase extends Object
Manages the operations related to Item storage and retrieval in Firestore.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemDatabase

      public ItemDatabase()
      Constructs a ItemDatabase and initializes the connection to Firestore's itemList collection, setting up real-time data synchronization.

    • ItemDatabase

      public ItemDatabase(String collectionName)
      Constructs a ItemDatabase and initializes the connection to Firestore's itemList collection, setting up real-time data synchronization. Directly using this constructor is not recommended, it allows setting a custom collection for the purposes of unit tests
      Parameters:
      collectionName - Collection name of database

  • Method Details

    • registerListener

      public void registerListener(ItemListAdapter adapter, android.widget.TextView totalValueText, ArrayList<Filter> filters)
      Connects the item database to the RecyclerView UI
      Parameters:
      adapter - The ItemListAdapter currently associated with the ItemList view

    • update

      public void update(String id, Item item)
      Updates an item in the Firestore database to match a given Item.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the Item to update.
      item - The Item object to be retrieve new values from.

    • add

      public void add(Item item)
      Adds an item to the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item object to be added.

    • delete

      public void delete(String itemId)
      Deletes an item from the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to be deleted.

    • getTotalValue

      public double getTotalValue()
      Calculates the current total value of the item list
      Returns:
      Sum of value for all items in itemList

    • getItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getItems()
      Retrieves a reference to the item list
      Returns:
      A ArrayList of Items

    • sort

      public void sort(ItemSorting sorting)
      Given an ItemSorting, sorts the item list based on it
      Parameters:
      sorting - An instance of ItemSorting

    • filter

      public void filter(Filter filter)

    • filterall

      public void filterall(List<Filter> filters)

    • deleteSelected

      public void deleteSelected()
      Deprecated.
      Delete all items current selected in the itemList.
